title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, January 12, 2020
description: Today is the birthday of Walter Mosley (1952), author of the Easy Rawlins detective stories, the first of which is “Devil in a Blue Dress.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of Walter Mosley (1952), author of the Easy Rawlins detective stories, the first of which is “Devil in a Blue Dress.”
